full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DANG BKA' SDOD LAS GSHIN SPRAGS PA'I BSKANG GSO DANG DRUG BCU MA 'BUL TSUL BSTAN DGRA MA LUS BSREG BYED DUS MTHA'I ME DPUNG 'BAR BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(CES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DANG BKA' SDOD LAS GSHIN LA BSKANG GSO DANG 'BREL BA'I DRUG BCU MA 'BUL TSUL BSTAN DGRA MA LUS BSREG BYED BSKAL BA'I ME DPUNG 'BAR BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI BLO BZANG THUGS RJE'I MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG 'JAM MGON RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
